heading: Supervision
text:
The master plumber shall conduct his or her business to provide direct and continuing supervision in
  accordance with the provisions of this code.
      Exception: The provisions of this section 28-408.6.6 shall not apply to minor alterations or ordinary repairs, as defined in this
      code, or to the installation or alteration of gas service piping and gas meter piping, including meters, valves, regulators or
      related equipment, when such work is to be performed, serviced and maintained by utility corporations subject to the
      jurisdiction of the New York state public service commission.
